title: section 37 of the Social Welfare and Pensions Act 2007 (No. 8 of 2007)) of the
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Occupational Pension Schemes
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Occupational Pension Schemes 

(Registration) (Amendment) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited occupational pension scheme (registration) (amendment) regulation 2021

title: section 37 of the Social Welfare and Pensions Act 2007 (No. 8 of 2007)) of the
heading: 2. These Regulations and the Occupational Pension Schemes (Registration)
text_raw:
2. These Regulations and the Occupational Pension Schemes (Registration) 
Regulations 1991 shall be construed together as one and may be cited as the 
Occupational Pension Schemes (Registration) Regulations 1991 to 2021. 

Amendments
text_norm: 2 regulation occupational pension scheme (registration) regulation 1991 shall construed together one may cited occupational pension scheme (registration) regulation 1991 2021 amendment

title: section 37 of the Social Welfare and Pensions Act 2007 (No. 8 of 2007)) of the
heading: 3. The Occupational Pension Schemes (Registration) Regulations 1991
text_raw:
3. The Occupational Pension Schemes (Registration) Regulations 1991 

(S.I. No. 325 of 1991) are amended – 

(a) 

in Regulation 2, by the deletion of the following definitions – 

(i) 

“qualifying Irish scheme”, and 

(ii) 

“qualifying UK scheme”; 

(b) 

in Regulation 3, in sub-article (3), by the substitution of “1 
month” for “12 months”; 

(c) 

by the deletion of Regulation 4, and 

(d) by the deletion of Regulation 5. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

25 November, 2021. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS T.D., 
Minister for Social Protection. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 30th November, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [628] 3
text_norm: 3 occupational pension scheme (registration) regulation 1991 (s.i no 325 1991) amended - (a) regulation 2 deletion following definition - (i) qualifying irish scheme (ii) qualifying uk scheme (b) regulation 3 sub-article (3) substitution 1 month 12 month (c) deletion regulation 4 (d) deletion regulation 5 given official seal 25 november 2021 heather humphreys t.d minister social protection notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 30th november 2021 628 3

title: section 37 of the Social Welfare and Pensions Act 2007 (No. 8 of 2007)) of the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend S.I. No. 325 of 1991 to delete certain provisions which 
no longer apply arising from the revocation of the Occupational Pension 
Schemes (External Schemes)(United Kingdom) Regulations 2000 (S.I. No. 469 
of 2000) and the Occupational Pension Schemes (Schemes with External 
Members) (United Kingdom) Regulations 2000 (S.I. No. 470 of 2000) and to 
amend the period specified in Regulation 3(3) in which the trustees of a scheme 
are required to notify the Pensions Authority of changes to the information that 
has been provided to it for the purposes of registration under section 60 of the 
Pensions Act 1990. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [628]
